attributes.action: waive prescription charges for sufferers of psoriasis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As there is no permanent cure for psoriasis it can be a lifetime condition for many people. Psoriasis sufferers have an ongoing need for their medication creams etc.Prescriptions for patients who have this skin complaint should be free of charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
